verses.verse: "Do not judge <S%G2919><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> you be judged. <S%G2919><s%>
"For in the way <S%G2917><s%> you judge, <S%G2919><s%> you will be judged; <S%G2919><s%> and by your standard <S%G3358><s%> of measure, <S%G3354><s%> it will be measured <S%G3354><s%> to you.

"And why <S%G5101><s%> do you look <S%G991><s%> at the speck <S%G2595><s%> that is in your brother's eye, <S%G3788><s%> but do not notice <S%G2657><s%> the log <S%G1385><s%> that is in your own eye <S%G3788><s%>?

"Or <S%G2228><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> can you say <S%G3004><s%> to your brother, <S%G80><s%> 'Let <S%G863><s%> me take <S%G1544><s%> the speck <S%G2595><s%> out of your eye, <S%G3788><s%>' and behold, <S%G2400><s%> the log <S%G1385><s%> is in your own eye <S%G3788><s%>?

"You hypocrite, <S%G5273><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> take <S%G1544><s%> the log <S%G1385><s%> out of your own eye, <S%G3788><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> you will see <S%G1227><s%> clearly <S%G1227><s%> to take <S%G1544><s%> the speck <S%G2595><s%> out of your brother's eye. <S%G3788><s%>

"Do not give <S%G1325><s%> what <S%G3588><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%> to dogs, <S%G2965><s%> and do not throw <S%G906><s%> your pearls <S%G3135><s%> before <S%G1715><s%> swine, <S%G5519><s%> lest <S%G3379><s%> they trample <S%G2662><s%> them under <S%G2662><s%> their feet, <S%G4228><s%> and turn <S%G4762><s%> and tear <S%G4486><s%> you to pieces. <S%G4486><s%>
"Ask, <S%G154><s%> and it shall be given <S%G1325><s%> to you; seek, <S%G2212><s%> and you shall find; <S%G2147><s%> knock, <S%G2925><s%> and it shall be opened <S%G455><s%> to you.
"For everyone <S%G3956><s%> who asks <S%G154><s%> receives, <S%G2983><s%> and he who seeks <S%G2212><s%> finds, <S%G2147><s%> and to him who knocks <S%G2925><s%> it shall be opened. <S%G455><s%>

"Or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> man <S%G444><s%> is there among <S%G1537><s%> you, when <S%G3739><s%> his son <S%G5207><s%> shall ask <S%G154><s%> him for a loaf, <S%G740><s%> will give <S%G1929><s%> him a stone <S%G3037><s%>?
"Or <S%G2228><s%> if <S%G2532><s%> he shall ask <S%G154><s%> for a fish, <S%G2486><s%> he will not give <S%G1929><s%> him a snake, <S%G3789><s%> will he?

"If <S%G1487><s%> you then, <S%G3767><s%> being <S%G1510><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> know <S%G3609><s%> how <S%G3609><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> good <S%G18><s%> gifts <S%G1390><s%> to your children, <S%G5043><s%> how <S%G4214><s%> much <S%G4214><s%> more <S%G3123><s%> shall your Father <S%G3962><s%> who is in heaven <S%G3772><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> what is good <S%G18><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who ask <S%G154><s%> Him!

"Therefore, <S%G3767><s%> however <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3745><s%> you want <S%G2309><s%> people <S%G444><s%> to treat <S%G4160><s%> you, so <S%G3779><s%> treat <S%G4160><s%> them, for this <S%G3778><s%> is the Law <S%G3551><s%> and the Prophets. <S%G4396><s%>

"Enter <S%G1525><s%> by the narrow <S%G4728><s%> gate; <S%G4439><s%> for the gate <S%G4439><s%> is wide, <S%G4116><s%> and the way <S%G3598><s%> is broad <S%G2149><s%> that leads <S%G520><s%> to destruction, <S%G684><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> are those <S%G3588><s%> who enter <S%G1525><s%> by it.

"For the gate <S%G4439><s%> is small, <S%G4728><s%> and the way <S%G3598><s%> is narrow <S%G2346><s%> that leads <S%G520><s%> to life, <S%G2222><s%> and few <S%G3641><s%> are those <S%G3588><s%> who find <S%G2147><s%> it.

"Beware <S%G4337><s%> of the false <S%G5578><s%> prophets, <S%G5578><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> to you in sheep's clothing, <S%G1742><s%> but inwardly <S%G2081><s%> are ravenous <S%G727><s%> wolves. <S%G3074><s%>

"You will know <S%G1921><s%> them by their fruits. <S%G2590><s%> Grapes <S%G4718><s%> are not gathered <S%G4816><s%> from thorn <S%G173><s%> [bushes,] nor <S%G2228><s%> figs <S%G4810><s%> from thistles, <S%G5146><s%> are they?

"Even so, <S%G3779><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> bears <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit; <S%G2590><s%> but the bad <S%G4550><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> bears <S%G4160><s%> bad <S%G4190><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

"A good <S%G18><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> produce <S%G5342><s%> bad <S%G4190><s%> fruit, <S%G2590><s%> nor <S%G3761><s%> can a bad <S%G4550><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> produce <S%G5342><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit. <S%G2590><s%>

"Every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> that does not bear <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is cut <S%G1581><s%> down <S%G1581><s%> and thrown <S%G906><s%> into the fire. <S%G4442><s%>
"So <S%G1065><s%> then, <S%G686><s%> you will know <S%G1921><s%> them by their fruits. <S%G2590><s%>

"Not everyone <S%G3956><s%> who says <S%G3004><s%> to Me, 'Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%>' will enter <S%G1525><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven; <S%G3772><s%> but he who does <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of My Father <S%G3962><s%> who is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

"Many <S%G4183><s%> will say <S%G3004><s%> to Me on that day, <S%G2250><s%> 'Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> did we not prophesy <S%G4395><s%> in Your name, <S%G3686><s%> and in Your name <S%G3686><s%> cast <S%G1544><s%> out demons, <S%G1140><s%> and in Your name <S%G3686><s%> perform <S%G4160><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> miracles <S%G1411><s%>?'
"And then <S%G5119><s%> I will declare <S%G3670><s%> to them, 'I never <S%G3763><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> you; depart <S%G672><s%> from Me, you who practice <S%G2038><s%> lawlessness. <S%G458><s%>'

"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> everyone <S%G3956><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> hears <S%G191><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of Mine, <S%G1473><s%> and acts <S%G4160><s%> upon them, may be compared <S%G3666><s%> to a wise <S%G5429><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> his house <S%G3614><s%> upon the rock. <S%G4073><s%>

"And the rain <S%G1028><s%> descended, <S%G2597><s%> and the floods <S%G4215><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and the winds <S%G417><s%> blew, <S%G4154><s%> and burst <S%G4363><s%> against <S%G4363><s%> that house; <S%G3614><s%> and [yet] it did not fall, <S%G4098><s%> for it had been founded <S%G2311><s%> upon the rock. <S%G4073><s%>

"And everyone <S%G3956><s%> who hears <S%G191><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> of Mine, <S%G1473><s%> and does not act <S%G4160><s%> upon them, will be like <S%G3666><s%> a foolish <S%G3474><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> built <S%G3618><s%> his house <S%G3614><s%> upon the sand. <S%G285><s%>

"And the rain <S%G1028><s%> descended, <S%G2597><s%> and the floods <S%G4215><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and the winds <S%G417><s%> blew, <S%G4154><s%> and burst <S%G4350><s%> against <S%G4350><s%> that house; <S%G3614><s%> and it fell, <S%G4098><s%> and great <S%G3173><s%> was its fall. <S%G4431><s%>"

The result <S%G1096><s%> was that when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> words, <S%G3056><s%> the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> were amazed <S%G1605><s%> at His teaching; <S%G1322><s%>
for He was teaching <S%G1321><s%> them as [one] having <S%G2192><s%> authority, <S%G1849><s%> and not as their scribes. <S%G1122><s%>
